name: Skunk and the Sanctuary - Online Demo
name_original: Skunk and the Sanctuary - Online Demo
description:
This is an online demo version of Skunk and the Sanctuary.

Due to file limitations, the browser version will remain limited to twenty scenes, while the downloadable version will continue to see updates.

--------------------

On January 9th in the year 1987 ZE, the goddess Skunk appeared in the world of Galmiun as the result of a wish granted by a wicked imp named Lumstigethers.

The year is now 2159, and Skunk, having spent much of her 172 years of life as a villain, has at last been brought to justice, thanks to the efforts of the hero Casino Grayleaf and her party of adventurers. Imprisoned in the Divine Sanctuary, a facility equipped for holding divine individuals who have proven themselves a threat to society, she must now live the life of an inmate.

Stripped of her freedom and her magic, her life is now in the hands of others. Will her spirit be broken by punitive cruelty? Or will she be rehabilitated through kindness?

--------------------

Most buttons to advance text.

Page Down to skip text.

Shift to review previous dialogue.

F4 to toggle full screen mode.

F3 to toggle aspect ratio.
